title: Reading Delimited Data
text:
Recode “Type” Variable & Filter Results

#Nested else if per instructions to OVERWRITE type of glass
glass |> mutate(
         Type_of_glass = ifelse(Type_of_glass == 1, "building_windows_float_processed",
            ifelse(Type_of_glass == 2, "building_windows_non_float_processed",
              ifelse(Type_of_glass == 3, "vehicle_windows_float_processed",
               ifelse(Type_of_glass == 4, "vehicle_windows_non_float_processed",
                ifelse(Type_of_glass == 5, "containers",
                 ifelse(Type_of_glass == 6, "tableware",
                  ifelse(Type_of_glass == 7, "headlamps","Other")))))))
                  ) |>
          filter(Fe < 0.2 & (Type_of_glass == "tableware" | Type_of_glass == "headlamps"))

title: Reading Delimited Data
section: Remove columns and add mean & median columns
text:
Remove columns and add mean & median columns

#Remove seq_name and nuc column
#add mean and median - apply single mean and median statement to multiple variables
yeast <- yeast |> 
      select(-seq_name, -nuc) |>
      mutate(
        across(c(mcg,gvh,alm,mit,erl,pox,vac), mean, .names = "mean_{.col}"),
        across(c(mcg,gvh,alm,mit,erl,pox,vac), median, .names = "median_{.col}")
             ) |>
      group_by(class)

yeast
